title: How big grocers in Canada are preparing for COVID
description: While none of the major grocers in Canada say they plan to ration certain items  a food supply expert said he wouldn t be surprised to see the practice emerge as concerns over COVID   increase
content: Grocery stores across Canada are preparing for customers stockpiling supplies to get through the COVID   pandemic Across the country  customers have been heading to stores in droves to pick up items like toilet paper  hand sanitizer and non perishable item    chars
